subject: DHL traking number
description_text: Could you send me the DHL traking number of my order: #SSN3782

conversations.body_text: Hi Panagiotis Zeppos,    We apologize for the limited stock of Plus X. We've already shipped this item to you via UPS Express. Should any customs duties arise, we will reimburse you for them—please don't worry.

So,i dont have to pay customs right ?

Στις Τρί 2 Δεκ 2025, 12:02 ο χρήστης service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> Hi Panagiotis Zeppos,
>
> We apologize for the limited stock of Plus X. We've already shipped this
> item to you via UPS Express. Should any customs duties arise, we will
> reimburse you for them—please don't worry.
>
> On Mon, 1 Dec at 11:43 AM , Panagiotis Zeppos <panzeppos1@gmail.com>
> wrote:
> Could you send me the DHL traking number of my order: #SSN3782
>
> 7183:4206036
>

So, from which country will the pedals be shipped to me now?
Are you sure that I won’t have to pay customs, and if I do pay, will the
customs  money be refunded to me?

Στις Τρί 2 Δεκ 2025 στις 12:02 μ.μ., ο/η service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> Hi Panagiotis Zeppos,
>
> We apologize for the limited stock of Plus X. We've already shipped this
> item to you via UPS Express. Should any customs duties arise, we will
> reimburse you for them—please don't worry.
>
> On Mon, 1 Dec at 11:43 AM , Panagiotis Zeppos <panzeppos1@gmail.com>
> wrote:
> Could you send me the DHL traking number of my order: #SSN3782
>
> 7183:4206036
>

Hi Panagiotis Zeppos,  Your order is currently being shipped from China, as the German warehouse is temporarily out of stock. If any customs duties are incurred, we will cover the cost. Please rest assured.

Hi, can you send me the UPS tracking number of my order, so i can check the
progress of it.

Hi Panagiotis Zeppos,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your package has been delivered—did you receive it?  1Z144AW70407758517

Yes I have received the package and i am very pleased from the pedals and
your support in the end l didn't have to pay custom's.

Thanks for your great help.
